edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.minesweeper.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Hello, The Grid class is the foundation for minesweeper, applies mine locations, checks if something is open, makes flags functional, etc.
    Version:
    2015/03/04 for lab07, cs56, W15, July 2016 for Legacy Code, cs56, M16
    Author:
    Caleb Nelson, David Acevedo, Isaiah Egan, Austin Hwang, Sai Srimat
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Removes a flag on a cell that has one

      Looks for surrounding numbers near the cell and opens them, repeats when find another zero

      Check to see if a user placed a flag on that cell
